body_html:
Tested on Tensorflow 1.10.0 and tensorflow built with MKL is slower for LSTM models. I updated

config.inter_op_parallelism_threads, config.intra_op_parallelism_threads

with difference combination and could not see significant improvement.
body_text:
Tested on Tensorflow 1.10.0 and tensorflow built with MKL is slower for LSTM models. I updated
config.inter_op_parallelism_threads, config.intra_op_parallelism_threads

with difference combination and could not see significant improvement.
body:
Tested on Tensorflow 1.10.0 and tensorflow built with MKL is slower for LSTM models. I updated 
```
config.inter_op_parallelism_threads, config.intra_op_parallelism_threads
```
with difference combination and could not see significant improvement.
